explains: adv. 心理上地；心理学地

sentences.cn: 就心理而言，这次失败是致命的。

sentences.en: It was very important psychologically for us to succeed.
sentences.cn: 取得成功，在心理上对我们非常重要。

sentences.en: The possibility of receiving an award also produces a state of hope—a state that is in itself psychologically rewarding.
sentences.cn: 获得奖项的可能性也会使人产生一种满怀希望的状态，这种状态本身就是一种心理上的奖赏。
